SEARCH
Module com.example.snakegame
Package com.example.snakeGame

Interface Controller

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface Controller
The controller controls the main logic in the game. It responsible for when to draw the snake, food and paddle on the screen. It is also responsible for passing input like the arrow keys into the snake.

  • Method Details

    • initialise

      void initialise(View view, Model model)
      initialise the controller
      Parameters:
      view - The view used in the game
      model - The model where all data are stored

    • startup

      void startup(ViewController.ObjectToNotify object)
      Startup the game Stores the current score and compare with the game high score. saves the score if the score is higher or discard if otherwise.
      Parameters:
      object - stores all parameters (menu, canvas) that need to be updated during the game

    • update

      void update()
      Update the model when the snake eat food. Checks if the game has ended or paused before drawing the snake and food. update the score of the game. draw the snake and the food.

    • onKeyPressed

      void onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      listen for key press change the direction of the snake depending on the key pressed
      Parameters:
      event - for the key pressed
